s.text: Eventually a small, dim light bulb illuminated above my head, and I simply went to the Slate Web site--where, of course, your posting was waiting.
No one ever asks whether a white actor, as a white actor, should have played a given role.
No one ever asks whether a white actor, as a white actor, should have played a given role.

No one ever asks whether a white actor, as a white actor, should have played a given role.
